mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users (fb_profile_id, screen_name, last_lat, last_lon, last_activity) values (#{facebookProfileId},#{screenName},#{lastLocation.latitude},#{lastLocation.longitude},NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT user_id FROM users WHERE fb_profile_id = #{value}
mapper.sql: SELECT u.user_id as userId, u.fb_profile_id as userFacebookProfileId, u.screen_name as userScreenName, u.last_activity as userLastActivity, u.last_lat as userLastLatitude, u.last_lon as userLastLongitude, p.broadcast_loc as preferencesBroadcastLocation, p.show_profile_pic as preferencesShowProfilePicture
FROM users u INNER JOIN user_preferences p ON p.user_id = u.user_id
